Uses of Class
com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianRequest

  • Packages that use SiperianRequest 
    Package Description
    com.siperian.sif.client
    API to execute SIF requests on a remote Siperian Hub Server using a single class, SiperianClient, that abstracts a choice of protocols: EJB, SOAP, and HTTP.
    com.siperian.sif.message
    Provides data objects and abstract classes for the Siperian Hub APIs.
    com.siperian.sif.message.am
    Provides request and response objects for Siperian Hub Activity Manager APIs.
    com.siperian.sif.message.hm
    Provides request and response objects for Siperian Hub Hierarchy Manager APIs.
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm
    MRM message API.

    • Uses of SiperianRequest in com.siperian.sif.client

      Sub-classes implement this method to handle request processing.
      protected SiperianResponse HttpSiperianClient._process(SiperianRequest request) 
      protected SiperianResponse EjbSiperianClient._process(SiperianRequest request) 
      SiperianRequest CertificateHelper.encryptRequest(SiperianRequest request, String applicationName, String requestName) 
      SiperianResponse SiperianClient.process(SiperianRequest request)
      Called to process a request.
      void SiperianClient.setProperties(Properties config, SiperianRequest request)
      Used by SiperianClient.process(SiperianRequest), this sets the username, password, and orsId to the request if they are not already set.
      protected void SiperianClient.setSecurityPayloadInRequest(SiperianRequest request)

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SiperianObjectRequest
      Base class for Siperian Hub requests that operate on a specified Siperian object.
      class  WrappedRequest
      Abstract class for ORS-specific generated requests.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WrappedRequest.copyRequest(SiperianRequest fromRequest, SiperianRequest toRequest)
      Copy username, password, ORS ID, and interaction ID from one request to another.

    • Uses of SiperianRequest in com.siperian.sif.message.hm

      Subclasses of SiperianRequest in com.siperian.sif.message.hm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddRelationshipRequest
      Add a new Relationship/effective period for an existing relationship.
      class  DeleteRelationshipRequest
      Delete a Relationship between two Entities.
      class  GetEntityGraphRequest
      Fetch a list of Relationships and Entities that represent the graph of Entities related to the Entities in the request.
      class  GetOneHopRequest
      Fetch one level of Relationships and related Entities for the Entities specified in the request.
      class  RelationshipRequestBase
      This is the base class for Add, Update and Delete Relationship requests.
      class  SearchHmQueryRequest
      This request is used to search HM Entities or Relationships.
      class  UpdateRelationshipRequest
      Update a Relationship between two Entities.

    • Uses of SiperianRequest in com.siperian.sif.message.mrm

      Subclasses of SiperianRequest in com.siperian.sif.message.mrm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AcceptUnmatchedRecordsAsUniqueRequest
      Represents a request object to accept the unmatched records as unique records.
      class  ApplyChangeListRequest
      Represents a request object to apply all the changes in a change list to the current Operational Reference Store (ORS).
      class  AssignUnmergedRecordsRequest
      Deprecated. 
      Use UpdateTaskRequest instead of AssignUnmergedRecordsRequest.
      class  AuditRequest
      Represents a request object to add additional log entries to the MDM Hub audit trail.
      class  AuthenticateRequest
      Represents a request object to authenticate a user against the specified Operational Reference Store (ORS).
      class  CanUnmergeRecordsRequest
      Represents a request object to determine whether the specified cross-reference record (XREF) can be unmerged from the consolidated base object record.
      class  CleansePutRequest
      Represents a request object to update or insert a record into a base or dependent object.
      class  CleanseRequest
      Represents a request object to invoke the cleanse function defined in the MDM Hub to cleanse the input record.
      class  CleanTableRequest
      Represents a request object to remove all data from an Operational Reference Store (ORS) table and all its companion tables.
      class  ClearAssignedUnmergedRecordsRequest
      Deprecated. 
      Use UpdateTaskRequest instead of ClearAssignedUnmergedRecordsRequest
      class  CreateChangeListRequest
      Represents a request object to create a change list in the XML format for the current Operational Reference Store (ORS).
      class  CreateTaskRequest
      Creates a new task and initializes its properties and data.
      class  DeleteRequest
      Represents a request object to delete the specified records from the MDM Hub.
      class  DescribeSiperianObjectRequest
      Represents a request object to retrieve the metadata of the MDM Hub objects.
      class  ExecuteBatchAutoMatchAndMergeRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the match and automerge batch jobs.
      class  ExecuteBatchAutomergeRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the automerge batch job.
      class  ExecuteBatchBackfillAllRequest
      JobStartCleanseRequest is a request object to call Staging Job.
      class  ExecuteBatchBackfillRequest
      JobStartCleanseRequest is a request object to call Staging Job.
      class  ExecuteBatchBVTSnapshotRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the best version of the truth (BVT) snapshot batch job.
      class  ExecuteBatchCleanStrpRequest
      JobCleanStrpRequest is a request object to call Clean STRP.
      class  ExecuteBatchDeleteRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the delete batch job.
      class  ExecuteBatchExternalMatchRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the external match batch job.
      class  ExecuteBatchExtractBVTVersionsRequest 
      class  ExecuteBatchGenerateMatchTokensRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the generate match tokens batch job.
      class  ExecuteBatchGroupRequest
      A BatchGroup is a set of batch jobs executed together, some sequentially and some in parallel according to the configuration.
      class  ExecuteBatchInitialSmartSearchIndexingRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the initially index smart search data batch job.
      class  ExecuteBatchKeyMatchRequest
      Represents a request object to perform the key match batch job.
      class  ExecuteBatchLoadRequest
      JobLoadMasterRequest is a request object to call Load Job.
      class  ExecuteBatchMatchAnalyzeRequest
      JobMatchRequest is a request object to call Match Job.

      JobMatchRequest is a request object to call Match Job.
      class  ExecuteBatchMatchRootRequest
      JobMatchRequest is a request object to call Match Job.

      ExecuteBatchPromoteRequest is a request object to call Promote Job.

      ExecuteBatchRecalculateBoRequest is a request object to call Recalculate BO Job.

      ExecuteBatchRecalculateBvtRequest is a request object to call Recalculate BVT Job.

      JobRequest is a parent request object for all job requests.

      JobStartCleanseRequest is a request object to call Staging Job.

      ExecuteBatchSynchronizeRequest is a request object to call Synchronize Job.

      ExecuteBatchUnmergeRequest is a request object to call Batch Unmerge Job.
      class  ExecuteBatchValidateFKRelationshipsRequest
      ExecuteBatchValidateFKRelationshipsRequest is a request object to call Validate Foreign Key Relationships Job.
      class  FlagForAutomergeRequest
      Set automerge flag for the record in the match table.
      class  GenerateConstraintsRequest
      GenerateConstraintsRequest is a request object to Generate Constraints.
      class  GetAggregatePeriodRequest
      Represents a request object to retrieve the aggregate period for a base object record.
      class  GetAssignableUsersForTasksRequest
      Retrieves the list of users who can have a specific list of tasks assigned.
      class  GetAssignedRecordsRequest
      Deprecated. 
      Use Task APIs instead. GetTasksRequest
      class  GetBatchGroupStatusRequest
      Get status of most recent execution; polls for status after executing asynchronously.
      class  GetBvtRequest
      Retrieves the best version of truth (BVT) from the specified base object or package using a known key.
      class  GetDependentObjectRequest
      Deprecated. 
      As of 9.0
      class  GetEffectivePeriodsRequest
      Compute the aggregate effective periods for a BO record identified by ROWID_OBJECT Required Parameters:
      class  GetLookupValueRequest
      Retrieves the lookup display name (lookup code description) for the specific lookup values (lookup codes) on specified lookup columns.
      class  GetLookupValuesRequest
      Retrieves the list of valid lookup values (lookup codes) and lookup display names (lookup code descriptions) for the specified lookup columns.
      class  GetMatchedRecordsRequest
      Retrieves the match candidates for the specified record.
      class  GetMergeHistoryRequest
      Retrieves a tree representing the history of merges for a specified base object record.
      class  GetOrsListRequest
      Retrieves a list of operational record stores (ORS) registered in the master database.
      class  GetOrsMetadataRequest
      Export metadata to a change list XML file.
      class  GetRequest
      Retrieve a single row of data from the specified package.
      class  GetResourcePrivilegesRequest
      Get privilege information about multiple resources.
      class  GetSearchResultsRequest
      Retrieves additional data when the number of records found by the SIF API search queries (SearchMatch, SearchQuery, GetMatchedRecords) exceeds the number of records to return specified in the search API request.
      class  GetSiperianObjectCompatibilityRequest
      Request to get a checksum that represents the definition of the specified object in Siperian Hub.
      class  GetSystemTrustSettingsRequest
      Retrieves the system-specific trust settings for the specified columns.
      class  GetTaskLineageRequest
      Retrieves a list of tasks belonging to a user, group, or role.
      class  GetTasksRequest
      Retrieves a list of tasks belonging to a user, group, or role.
      class  GetTrustGraphDataRequest
      Retrieves the data to plot the trust decay curve for the specified trust setting.
      class  GetTrustScoreRequest
      Retrieves the current trust score for the specified column in a base object record.
      class  GetUnmergedRecordCountRequest
      Get the number of unmerged records.
      class  GetValidationStatusRequest
      Retrieve the ORS validation status
      class  GetXrefForEffectiveDateRequest
      Retrieves a list of xref records for the specified BO rowid object, effective date and history Date.
      class  Link2Request
      For internal use only
      class  LinkRequest
      Deprecated.  
      class  ListSiperianObjectsRequest
      Returns metadata of Siperian Hub objects.
      class  MergeRequest
      Merges two base object records that have been identified as representing the same object.
      class  MultiMergeRequest
      Merges multiple base object records that have been identified as representing the same object and allows specifying the field level overrides for the merged record.
      class  PreviewBvtRequest
      Before doing a merge, preview what a BO record would look like if a given set of records were merged or pending updates applied.
      class  PromotePendingXrefsRequest
      Promotes or flags for promotion the XREF records specified in the request.
      class  PutDependentObjectRequest
      Deprecated. 
      As of 9.0
      class  PutRequest
      Inserts or updates a single record identified by a key into a base object.
      class  ReassignRecordsRequest
      Deprecated. 
      Use Task APIs instead. UpdateTaskRequest
      class  RegisterCustomIndexRequest
      RegisterCustomIndexRequest is a request object to call Register Custom Index.
      class  RegisterCustomTableObjectRequest
      RegisterCustomTableObjectRequest is a request object to call Register Custom Table Object.
      class  RegisterUsersRequest
      The RegisterUsers API allows for automated provisioning of users that are authenticated externally using one of the registered JAAS login modules.
      class  RemoveMatchedRecordsRequest
      If user decides that one object is not a match with list of other objects, then this will remove corresponding records from [BO]_MTCH table.
      class  ResetBatchGroupRequest
      Finds the last execution status of the given batch group, and if its status is failed, sets it to incomplete.
      class  RestoreRequest
      Restores the specified XREF record(s) in the Hub.
      class  SearchLookupValuesRequest
      This request is used to search for lookup values that match a given lookup display name (lookup code description).
      class  SearchMatchRequest
      Searches for records in a package based on match columns and rule definitions.
      class  SearchQueryRequest
      Retrieves a set of records from an MRM package or a remote package satisfying the specified criteria.
      class  SearchRequestBase
      Base class for search requests (SearchQuery and SearchMatch) with parameters for paging and sorting.
      class  SetPasswordRequest
      Changes a user's password to a new password.
      class  SetRecordStateRequest
      Sets the record state of base object records identified by the specified keys.
      class  SyncCustomResourcesRequest
      Update related custom resources.
      class  TokenizeRequest
      Generates match tokens for a base object record that has been updated or inserted.
      class  Unlink2Request
      For internal use only
      class  UnlinkRequest
      Unlinks two or more base object records with the group id specified in the groupRecordKey field.
      class  UnmergeRequest
      Unmerges base object (BO) records.
      class  UnregisterUsersRequest
      The UnregisterUsers API allows for previously provisioned users (see RegisterUsers API) to be unregistered.
      class  UpdateMatchRecordRequest
      Create or update a record in a match table.
      class  UpdateTaskRequest
      Updates an existing task in one of the following ways: Reassign a task Change the task data Append to the task comment
      class  ValidateChangeListRequest
      Request to validate a change list against the current ORS.
      class  ValidateMetadataRequest
      ValidationRequest represents metadata validation function call.
      class  ValidateTasksRequest
      Validates the task metadata when the workflow engine is teamworks.
